articles.title: What does a black hole sound like? NASA has an answer - GPB News
articles.description: NASA began "sonifying" its famous photos of outer space to help people who are visually impaired enjoy the images. Recently, it recreated the sound of a black hole 240 million light-years away.
articles.content:
For the first time in history, earthlings can hear what a black hole sounds like: a low-pitched groaning, as if a very creaky heavy door was being opened again and again.
NASA released a 35-second a… [+3154 chars]

articles.title: NASA attempting to reinvigorate interest in space - Sky News Australia
articles.description: NASA is attempting to reinvigorate interest in American space exploration, starting with missions to the moon and moving further into the galaxy.
